guide.title: Guide
guide.subtitle: Learn and become a master
guide.mainSubtitle: Complete guide to Gomoku in MindPoint Arena
guide.welcomeText: I am Elder Qi Men, guardian of the gomoku way in MindPoint Arena. You have embarked on a challenging but glorious journey of cultivation.
guide.caroDesc: Gomoku is not just a game. It is a supreme tactical art, where each move is a step of cultivation, each victory is a breakthrough.
guide.goalDesc: From Unranked, you will go through 7 realms: Novice ‚Üí Apprentice ‚Üí Veteran ‚Üí Master ‚Üí Grandmaster ‚Üí Legend ‚Üí and finally Unmatched.
guide.rulesDesc: Two players take turns placing pieces on the board. Whoever forms 5 pieces in a row horizontally, vertically or diagonally wins.
guide.boardSizeDesc: Boards come in various sizes: 3x3 (beginner), 7x7 (basic), 15x15 (standard), 19x19 (expert). Larger sizes mean more complex tactics.
guide.thinkingTimeDesc: Each move has a time limit (10-45 seconds). Total match time ranges from 5-20 minutes. Running out of time results in automatic loss.
guide.turnPriorityDesc: The first player (X - black) has an advantage but must create a strong position from the start.
